name: Prirates
description:
This is the game I made for Buffalo Game Space's BGSjam7, which had the theme "with our powers combined". It's a shmup wherein primary colored pirates (hence the title "Prirates") combine their powers to shoot down enemy blimps and marine life.

While this is a jam game, I really like the idea of this, so I may return to it soon, and add all the things that I meant to do in the past 48 hours. So many things.

Sound effects were made by Mike Peters

Music and some enemy designs were made by Mark Miller, aka Emcee M.D.
